CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_260)) & "lightning/r/Report/00O1t00000991V4EAI/view?fv1=" & SUBSTITUTE(Name, "&", "%26"),"Action Plan - Open task","_blank") + BR() + HYPERLINK(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_260)) & "lightning/r/Report/00O6N000001FbK2UAK/view?fv1=" & SUBSTITUTE(Name, "&", "%26"),"Action Plan - Closed task","_blank") + BR() + HYPERLINK(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_260)) & "lightning/r/Report/00O6N000001FbJxUAK/view?fv0=" & SUBSTITUTE(Name, "&", "%26"),"Logged time pr customer","_blank")
CustomField.label: Task Reports
